author: IGN
description:
The story of a family and a family business. Check out The Phoenician Scheme trailer for this upcoming film starring Benicio del Toro as Zsa-zsa Korda, one of the richest men in Europe; Mia Threapleton as Liesl, his daughter/a nun; Michael Cera as Bjorn, their tutor. With: Riz Ahmed, Tom Hanks, Bryan Cranston, Mathieu Amalric, Richard Ayoade, Jeffrey Wright, Scarlett Johansson, Benedict Cumberbatch, Rupert Friend, Hope Davis.

The Phoenician Scheme is produced by Wes Anderson, Steven Rales, Jeremy Dawson, and John Peet. Story by Wes Anderson & Roman Coppola. The screenplay is by Wes Anderson. 

The Phoenician Scheme, directed by Wes Anderson, opens in theaters on May 30, 2025.
title: The Phoenician Scheme - Official Trailer (2025) Benicio del Toro, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Cera

author: IGN
description: Mistfall Hunter is a third-person action PvPvE extraction RPG set in a dark fantasy world, where the land is ravaged by dangerous monsters and endless perils in the wake of the gods' demise. Check out the Mistfall Hunter trailer to see action-packed gameplay and the threats you'll encounter. Mistfall Hunter will be available on Steam, Xbox, and Microsoft Store in 2025. A second beta begins on April 21st at 6:00 p.m. PT.
title: Mistfall Hunter - Official Beta 2 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
title: Jack Black posted a video of himself riding Jason Momoa in A Minecraft Movie. #minecraft #movie

author: IGN
description: Check out the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Sonic Rumble, a 3D-action battle royale game developed by SEGA. Players will duke it out in 32-player matches to be the last one standing. Sonic Rumble is launching on May 8 for iOS, Android, Google Play Games, and PC (Steam).
title: Sonic Rumble - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Demo Trailer for Metal Eden, a first-person sci-fi shooter developed by Reikon Games. Players will embody a cybernetic soldier on a deadly mission to save humanity. Make use of kinetic movements and high-powered weaponry to overcome platforming obstacles and enemies along the path to uncovering the secrets of Metal Eden. Metal Eden is launching on May 6 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) with a demo available now.
title: Metal Eden - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Predator: Killer of Killers trailer for this upcoming original animated action-adventure film set in the Predator universe. Predator: Killer of Killers will premiere on Hulu on June 6, 2025.

The anthology story follows three of the fiercest warriors in human history: a Viking raider guiding her young son on a bloody quest for revenge, a ninja in feudal Japan who turns against his Samurai brother in a brutal battle for succession, and a WWII pilot who takes to the sky to investigate an otherworldly threat to the Allied cause. But while all these warriors are killers in their own right, they are merely prey for their new opponent – the ultimate killer of killers.

Predator: Killer of Killers is directed by Dan Trachtenberg with Josh Wassung, from animation company The Third Floor, serving as co-director. The film is written by Micho Robert Rutare and story by Trachtenberg and Rutare, based on characters created by Jim Thomas & John Thomas. The producers are John Davis, D
title: Predator: Killer of Killers - Official Trailer (2025) Dan Trachtenberg

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Lootbound in this teaser trailer for the upcoming pixel-art roguelite RPG with tactical turn-based combat and dice-driven progression. Assemble your party, load them up with loot, and fight your way out of the dungeon while managing resources and surviving relentless enemy attacks in Lootbound. Lootbound will be available on PC via Steam in 2026.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Lootbound - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
title: Some of the best clips we got for the Xfinity Flyaway Sweepstakes. Presented by @xfinity

title: You'll just have to taste me, when he readies up. #sabrinacarpenter #fortnite #fortnitefestival

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at Welcome to Brightville in this exclusive reveal trailer for the upcoming immersive sim, where magic powers machinery and every choice matters. 

You play as an automaton unaffected by the influence of the AI that took over the city of Brightville. Navigate a dark world where magic and technology collide, experiment with magic abilities, interact with eccentric characters, and adapt to a hostile environment full of magic hazards and vicious sentient robots. 

Welcome to Brightville is coming 2027 to consoles and PC via Steam.
title: Welcome to Brightville - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Andor Season 2 teaser trailer for the next installment in the Star Wars franchise and follow up to the critically and commercially acclaimed Andor Season 1. Tension rises as the Empire tightens its grip on a galaxy far, far away and a rebellion grows from the cries of freedom from planet to planet culminating in the introduction to Star Wars: Rogue One.

The final season will unfold over 12 episodes broken down into four chapters of three episodes each. The first chapter of season 2 will premiere April 22, with subsequent chapters debuting each week, exclusively on Disney+. 

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn, Stellan Skarsgård

author: IGN
description:
When it comes to shipping games, conversation in the industry has been increasingly focused on financial pressures—prioritizing time, efficiency, and volume to meet business needs. This emphasis has fueled cynicism amongst players that companies are prioritizing profits over empowering game makers to create truly great games.

In this #DICE2025 talk, Marc Merrill (Co-founder and Chief Product Officer, Riot Games) talks about how game making is harder than ever, as players deserve great games and experiences worthy of their time, especially in a world where they have more entertainment options competing for their attention than ever before.

Marc shares how Riot prioritizes taking the time necessary to create games and experiences right for players, how this player-first philosophy shapes every decision Riot makes, and why this simple–yet ultimately complex–approach makes game development a meaningful career path.

Marc reflects on Riot’s evolution and share key lessons from the compa
title: Building Great Experiences for Players: A Never Ending Quest - Riot Games, Marc Merrill | DICE 2025

author: IGN
description:
A blade, unrelenting and unseen, hidden in the night. Her foes are vanquished in the flick of a second hand, their fate unraveled in its echo. Meet Duchess in this latest Elden Ring Nightreign trailer for this standalone cooperative spin-off set in a world parallel to that of 2022’s Elden Ring. Elden Ring Nightreign launches on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox, and Steam on May 30, 2025.

#EldenRing #EldenRingNightreign #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Duchess Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Captain America: Brave New World Digital and Blu-ray release date trailer for the latest film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. 

Captain America: Brave New World stars Anthony Mackie, Harrison Ford, Danny Ramirez, Shira Haas, Carl Lumbly, Xosha Roquemore, with Giancarlo Esposito, Liv Tyler, and Tim Blake Nelson.

In Captain America: Brave New World, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident after meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.

The film is directed by Julius Onah and produced by Kevin Feige and Nate Moore. Louis D’Esposito and Charles Newirth serve as executive producers. The screenplay is by Rob Edwards and Malcolm Spellman & Dalan Musso and Julius Onah & Peter Glanz, with story by Rob Edwards and Malcolm Spellman & Dalan Musson.

Captain America: Brave New World will rele
title: Captain America: Brave New World - Official Digital & Blu-ray Release Date Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Meet Aurélien Giraud in this behind-the-scenes video for Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4. Learn more about this new skater joining the roster of new Pros in the upcoming sports game. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 returns, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, music, and more. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 will be available on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Nintendo Switch, Battle.net, and PC (Steam) on July 11, 2025.

#TonyHawk #TonyHawksProSkater #Gaming
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 - Official Aurélien Giraud Behind-The-Scenes

author: IGN
description:
A new era has arrived. New legends will be born. Who will make history next? Watch the WWE 2K25 WrestleMania trailer for this wrestling game. WWE 2K25 is now available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.

#WWE #WWE2K25 #Wrestlemania
title: WWE 2K25 - Official WrestleMania Trailer

author: IGN
description: Join game director Arek Woźniak from developer Space Goblin for a deep dive into the gameplay of Astrobotanica in this latest trailer for the upcoming botany-centric survival game set in a prehistoric version of Earth. In Astrobotanica, join alien botanist Xel as they explore a lush open-world environment full of primal flora and fauna, and memorable landscapes. As Xel, navigate survival challenges, including cultivation, plant research, exploration, human interaction, and more. Astrobotanica will be available in Early Access on PC via Steam. Learn more about Astrobotanica on Steam and via the Kickstarter campaign here if you're interested, respectively: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2720920/ASTROBOTANICA/ and https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/spacegoblinstudio/astrobotanica
title: Astrobotanica - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: With the Nintendo Switch approaching the end of its eight year run, there are still tons of games on the Nintendo console that deserve your attention. Here are 20 Nintendo Switch games that you still have time to play before the Nintendo Switch 2.
title: 20 Overlooked Nintendo Switch Games

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Fortnite Sabrina Carpenter trailer for the battle royale third-person shooter developed by Epic Games. Sabrina Carpenter has dropped into Fortnite as the Season 8 Icon of Fortnite Festival. Players can unlock the Sabrina Carpenter Outfit, themed cosmetics, and Jam Tracks like “Juno” and “Nonsense” through the Season 8 Music Pass. New Sabrina Carpenter-themed items are also available on the Item Shop such as the "A Sweet Little Bundle" packed with items for fans to enjoy. Sabrina Carpenter is available now in Fortnite.

#Fortnite #SabrinaCarpenter #Gaming
title: Fortnite x Sabrina Carpenter - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Last of Us Season 2 on Max is right around the corner! To prepare, we sat down with The Last of Us creators Neil Druckmann and Craig Mazin, as well as series cast Bella Ramsey, Gabriel Luna, Kaitlyn Dever, Isabela Merced, and Young Mazino to get their opinions on whether or not Joel was right, what made Season 2 the right time to re-introduce spores to the story, adapting the unadaptable, and their ideal end of the world food. 

Season 2 of The Last of Us will challenge Joel and Ellie more than ever before, and the introductions of characters like Abby, Jesse and Dina will both elevated and complicate their story further. The cordyceps continues to spread and while a safe haven has been found in Jacksonville, how long can safety truly last in the apocalypse? 

Our The Last of Us interview is filled with laughs and serious discussions, as the cast and creators explore Joel's actions in Pedro Pascal's absence. The Last of Us Season 2 premieres on HBO and Max on April 13.
title: Was Joel Right? The Last of Us Creators Druckmann and Mazin Give Us Their Answer

author: IGN
title: Nintendo has explained why Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour is $9.99 and why it's NOT free. #switch2
